faqs.title: What is Bonk World?
faqs.content: Bonk World is simply a collection of multiple generative series with some occasional 1/1 pieces.

faqs.title: Why Solana?
faqs.content: We are attracted to Solana because of the community and low transaction fees.

faqs.title: Where is the Bonk World roadmap?
faqs.content: We don't have one! We are not the typical kind of NFT project. We will be continually releasing collections of pure art.
